attributes.action: cap the interest rates on ALL loans at a maximum of no more than 40%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
some companies are charging customers who borrow money from them interest rates of OVER 430%.
the problems with these loans is that they are targeted , at the most part,to those who are unable to re-pay the loan, so a small loan could bankrupt many people.
